article_text: Josh Levs, a reporter and columnist for CNN, battled with his employer, Time Warner, over getting more paid paternity leave and eventually succeeded. His book “All In” seeks to be a sort of “Lean In” for men, and not just in the unsubtle title echo.

article_metadata.news-keywords: all in review, josh levs book, paid parental leave, work-life balance men, paternity leave, family leave, cnn, time warner
